Text:
Thanks, I was waiting for a FLAC version to hit.

Sounds a bit more subdued than the mp3 versions that are out, likely due to it being a vinyl rip. I haven't played it on my full system yet. So I'm basing that on what I hear on my PC speakers, which are to bad for PC speakers.
Great dynamic range, but a bit noisy--especially noticable on quieter parts. Not as clean as politux's other great releases.

@polybass 

Sorry mate, apparently it had USB in the lineage. :(
